@markwaddell11 Me too! But Phil is only 39% accurate, so just take his prognostication with a grain of salt
@smgarth But if the 6 more weeks of winter are anything like the last 6, we can handle it!
@Barry_Tyree It's not fake news! This is an old tradition, one that only holds a 39% accuracy. Prognostication, not a real forecast
Phil saw his shadow. It was cloudy out but they lit the stage, hence the shadow. If the 6 wks are anything like the last 6 we can handle it.
Six more weeks of winter.... #Punxsutawneyphil #GroundhogDay
